estuary.view

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • estuary.view.View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class View
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    Contains the JFrame window that the end user sees Listens for mouse actions to send to the controller
    Version:
    1.0 Oct 25, 2016
    Author:
    Sean
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
